Comment: Yeah.  I am rereading it now. The book was written in 1948 and so a lot of the details are wrong, but it is  spot on in may ways.  Orwell talks about:  \* changing the language (the official language, "Newspeak") to control how people think.  Not  dissimilar to banning certain words.   \* changing the records of the past to match the official narrative. They are doing this by insisting that what we know if the past is wrong, even blaming Biden for programs that Trump instituted, and by treating anyone that reports the actual truth, such as Amazon wanting to include the line item "tariffs," while the official line is that foreign countries pay these.
